name: SSF6
title: CS Site-Specific Factor 6
subtitle: Number of Positive Para-Aortic Nodes
notes: **Note**:  Record the number of positive para-aortic lymph nodes documented in the patient record.  Apply the same instructions in General Rules, Part I for coding Regional Nodes Positive to this data item.
rows: All para-aortic lymph nodes examined negative

1-89 para-aortic lymph nodes are positive. 
(Exact number of nodes positive)
90 or more para-aortic lymph nodes positive
Positive aspiration or core biopsy of para-aortic lymph node(s)
Positive para-aortic lymph nodes are documented, number not specified

OBSOLETE DATA CONVERTED V0200
See code 988

Not applicable for this site

Not applicable:  Information not collected for this case
(May include cases converted from code 888 used in CSv1 for "Not applicable" or when the item was not collected.  If this item is required to derive T, N, M, or any stage, use of code 988 may result in an error.)
